Package com.g1.mychess.player.controller

Class ProfileController

java.lang.Object
com.g1.mychess.player.controller.ProfileController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/v1/profile") public class ProfileController extends Object
Controller class that handles API requests related to player profiles, including fetching player profile details, updating ratings, updating profiles, and retrieving rating history and leaderboard information.

    • updatePlayerProfile

      @PutMapping("/{playerId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> updatePlayerProfile(@Valid @PathVariable @Valid Long playerId, @RequestBody PlayerProfileUpdateDTO profileUpdateDTO)
      Updates the profile information of a player.
      Parameters:
      playerId - the ID of the player whose profile is to be updated
      profileUpdateDTO - the DTO containing the updated profile data
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with the updated profile status
